title: 536 20 "The Battle in the Ryugu Palace! Zoro vs. Hordy!"Transliteration: "Ryūgū-jō no Kessen! Zoro tai Hōdi" (Japanese:竜宮城の決戦！ゾロVSホーディ) Yoshihiro Ueda Jin Tanaka February 19, 2012(2012-02-19) March 27, 2022
transformers_text: 536 20 The Battle in the Ryu gu Palace Zoro vs Hor dy Transliteration Ry g j no K essen Zoro tai H di Japanese VS Yoshihiro Ueda J in Tanaka February 19 2012 2012 02 19 March 27 2022 At the Ryu gu Palace Hor dy says that he will destroy Neptune's soldiers and realize Ar long's ambitions once again He proceeds to destroy the palace by flooding it Zoro confronts Hor dy underwater but the fish man uses his own man to prevent his attack Zoro has Us opp and Brook untie the guards while he continues to fight Hor dy Meanwhile while healing Hachi Sanji and Chopper are cornered by the island's guards again Just as Sanji says that they have been framed for their crimes Luffy and S hira hoshi arrive and regroup with the others The citizens of the island think that Luffy is responsible for the kidnapping However Mega lo has reached its limit and forces S hira hoshi out Chopper orders Sanji not to turn around or he will die
tf_idf_text: battle ryu palace zoro hor transliteration essen zoro tai japanese yoshihiro ueda tanaka february march ryu palace hor say destroy neptune soldier realize longs ambition proceeds destroy palace flood zoro confronts hor underwater fish man use man prevent attack zoro opp brook untie guard continue fight hor meanwhile heal hachi sanji chopper corner island guard sanji say frame crime luffy hira hoshi arrive regroup others citizens island think luffy responsible kidnap however mega reach limit force hira hoshi chopper order sanji not turn around die
